doc.name: browserNewInstance
doc.summary: Sent when a new browser instance is created.

examples.example:
on browserNewInstance pInstanceId
put pInstanceId & return after sInstances
end browserNewInstance

description.p: The browserNewInstance message is sent to the current card of the stack when a new browser object is created in the stack's window.
The instanceId is the integer identifier of the new browser object
Note: For general information on using the browser library, see the notes in the revBrowserOpen function reference.
